content:
bnjbvr commented on Issue #2600:

@bjorn3 What's the context of this PR, please?

bjorn3 commented on Issue #2600:

I don't know if I will have enough of a riscv backend for the new backend framework before the old backend framework gets removed. This PR makes it possible to remove the old riscv backend together with the rest of the old backend framework without having to remove any uses of it outside the tests for the old backend framework.

bnjbvr commented on Issue #2600:

I don't know if I will have enough of a riscv backend for the new backend framework before the old backend framework gets removed. This PR makes it possible to remove the old riscv backend together with the rest of the old backend framework without having to remove any uses of it outside the tests for the old backend framework.

Makes sense!
